control_attributes.control_description: The information system alerts [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles] when the unauthorized installation of software is detected.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization plans for the transfer of essential missions and business functions to alternate processing and/or storage sites with little or no loss of operational continuity and sustains that continuity through information system restoration to primary processing and/or storage sites.

Control Statement: The information system alerts [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles] when the unauthorized installation of software is detected.
